# CausalInvestData <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/status-active-brightgreen" align="right" />

> Simulated datasets for causal inference in institutional investment management.

`CausalInvestData` provides realistic, structured datasets to help researchers and analysts test causal inference methods such as matching, propensity score weighting, causal forests, and time-series modeling in a financial context.

## ğŸ“Š Example Usage

```r
library(CausalInvestData)
data(fund_performance)
head(fund_performance)

# Estimate treatment effect using matching
library(MatchIt)
m.out <- matchit(treatment ~ market_return + alpha + beta, data = fund_performance)
summary(m.out)
```
